mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.price AS "price", a.unit AS "unit", a.disaccount AS "disaccount", a.member_id AS "memberId", a.saler_id AS "saler.id", a.remark AS "remark", u8.name AS "saler.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cl_sale( id, name, quantity, price, unit, disaccount, member_id, saler_id, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{disaccount}, #{memberId}, #{saler.id}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cl_sale SET name = #{name}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, unit = #{unit}, disaccount = #{disaccount}, member_id = #{memberId}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
